record.field: Reconciliation "%(reconciliation)s" must be in "%(state)s" state for deletion.
Reconciliation line "%(line)s" of Reconciliation "%(reconciliation)s" is not in "Posted" state.
Reconciliation line "%(line)s" of Reconciliation "%(reconciliation)s" already belongs to the Reconciliation "%(reconciliation2)s".
Reconciliation "%(reconciliation)s" is not the last one.
Reconciliation "%(reconciliation)s" is not the next one.
Account Move can not be posted because account "%(account)s" has a confirmed bank reconciliation that invalidate the date.
